ThreeWayDialog.synopsis:
The players approach the drow commander at the goblin camp, escorted by a goblin who they rescued from a nearby druid grove. The drow is seeking that grove and upon learning its location from the goblin will prepare to raid it, demanding that the player help.

If the goblin recognises that the player is a True Soul - a figure of authority - her life will be spared. If she does not recognise this, the drow will execute her unless the player intervenes on her behalf.

automatic_ordering.reasoning: There is only one session provided ('ThreeWayDialog'), and no ordering or mutual exclusiveness constraints can be determined because no other sessions are provided for comparison.

ThreeWayDialog_41.speaker: Sazza
ThreeWayDialog_41.text: Mistress! It's me, yer loyal servant, Sazza. I'm back - an' I brought a friend.

ThreeWayDialog_3.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
ThreeWayDialog_3.text: A duergar? Tell me, Sazza, did your misadventures take you to the Underdark?

ThreeWayDialog_66.speaker: Sazza
ThreeWayDialog_66.text: They woz in some rickety druid grove! Mostly full of tieflin's, but them intruders you're after were hidin' out there!

ThreeWayDialog_20.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
ThreeWayDialog_20.text: I presume you dealt with my prey, and massacred the rest?

ThreeWayDialog_11.speaker: Sazza
ThreeWayDialog_11.text: Ah... well, the thing about that is... they sorta massacred us.

ThreeWayDialog_74.speaker: Sazza
ThreeWayDialog_74.text: This mug helped me escape though. I say we stick a few holes in them... show how grateful we are.

ThreeWayDialog_15.speaker: Narrator
ThreeWayDialog_15.text: *You feel a cold hand caress your mind as the drow appraises you.*
ThreeWayDialog_15.context: CinematicNodeContext: Camera cuts from player to drow as mindmeld occures

ThreeWayDialog_58.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
ThreeWayDialog_58.text: Oh dear. Your prisoner is one of the Absolute's favourites, Sazza. A True Soul.

ThreeWayDialog_5.speaker: Sazza
ThreeWayDialog_5.text: Nah. Can't be... they woz in the grove, hangin' around with the tieflin's.

ThreeWayDialog_57.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
ThreeWayDialog_57.text: Undercover, no doubt. Carrying out the Absolute's will. Oh, Sazza - you have made a grave error.

ThreeWayDialog_48.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
ThreeWayDialog_48.text: And it will be your last. My spiders are hungry, little one...

ThreeWayDialog_62.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
ThreeWayDialog_62.text: ...but before they feast, tell me where that grove is, and I may yet spare your life.

ThreeWayDialog_54.speaker: Sazza
ThreeWayDialog_54.text: It's past the bridge, to the east! Big ol' gate, covered in ivy! Don't hurt me, mistress. Please!

ThreeWayDialog_68.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
ThreeWayDialog_68.text: I will not hurt you. My spiders will have that pleasure.

ThreeWayDialog_38.speaker: Sazza
ThreeWayDialog_38.text: No! I mucked up, I'm sorry! But I didn't know who they woz... they didn't tell me nothin'!

ThreeWayDialog_13.speaker: Player
ThreeWayDialog_13.text: You only have to look at me to know I'm your superior, wretch.

ThreeWayDialog_76.speaker: Sazza
ThreeWayDialog_76.context: CinematicNodeContext: ~The captured goblin is dragged away by goblin guards. [Hide Sazza after walk off]

ThreeWayDialog_30.speaker: Sazza
ThreeWayDialog_30.text: You coulda told me who you woz!

ThreeWayDialog_17.speaker: Player
ThreeWayDialog_17.text: She's telling the truth. She didn't know.

ThreeWayDialog_14.speaker: Sazza
ThreeWayDialog_14.text: I told ya! I was tryin' to follow orders best I could!

ThreeWayDialog_22.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
ThreeWayDialog_22.text: Silence, wretch. And remember - you owe your miserable life to this one.

ThreeWayDialog_69.speaker: Sazza
ThreeWayDialog_69.text: I won't cause any more trouble - I swears it.
ThreeWayDialog_69.context: CinematicNodeContext: [reuse] The captured goblin scuttles away. [Hide Sazza after walk off]

ThreeWayDialog_21.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
ThreeWayDialog_21.text: Through sheer luck, that pathetic worm has brought me the information I need.

ThreeWayDialog_46.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
ThreeWayDialog_46.text: And it seems that the inhabitants of the grove trust you - we can use that against them.

ThreeWayDialog_63.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
ThreeWayDialog_63.text: You have a part to play in this slaughter.

ThreeWayDialog_10.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
ThreeWayDialog_10.text: Return to the grove. When my raiding party approaches, throw open the gate and signal me.

ThreeWayDialog_64.speaker: Narrator
ThreeWayDialog_64.text: *The fate of the grove's inhabitants hangs in the balance.*

ThreeWayDialog_56.speaker: Narrator
ThreeWayDialog_56.text: *Killing the drow here would spare them, but it might be better to face her warband at the grove itself, on familiar ground.*

ThreeWayDialog_40.speaker: Narrator
ThreeWayDialog_40.text: *On the other hand, participating in the slaughter as she asks may be the perfect way to earn her trust, and access to the cult's inner circle.*

ThreeWayDialog_9.speaker: Player
ThreeWayDialog_9.text: Many of the inhabitants of the grove are already dead.

ThreeWayDialog_75.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
ThreeWayDialog_75.text: You started the slaughter without me? How selfish.

ThreeWayDialog_19.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
ThreeWayDialog_19.text: But we can still fight side by side. Together, we will destroy any who have not died or fled.

ThreeWayDialog_8.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
ThreeWayDialog_8.text: I will gather my warband - we will reach the grove by next light.

ThreeWayDialog_35.speaker: Player
ThreeWayDialog_35.text: There's a problem - the grove is sealed by a druid ritual.

ThreeWayDialog_70.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
ThreeWayDialog_70.text: Their god is weak. Roots and branches will not save them from the Absolute's fury.

ThreeWayDialog_16.speaker: Player
ThreeWayDialog_16.text: I want no part of this.

ThreeWayDialog_49.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
ThreeWayDialog_49.text: I do not intend to lead a suicidal charge. The goblins are expendable; I am not.

ThreeWayDialog_34.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
ThreeWayDialog_34.text: The Absolute brought you here for a reason - to throw open those gates and crush our enemies.

ThreeWayDialog_50.speaker: Player
ThreeWayDialog_50.text: All right. Expect me at the grove.

ThreeWayDialog_1.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
ThreeWayDialog_1.text: Good. Marshalling the goblins is no simple matter, but my warband will be ready to attack by next light.

ThreeWayDialog_43.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
ThreeWayDialog_43.text: Once we are in position, we will wait for your signal, and then we will break them all.

ThreeWayDialog_73.speaker: Player
ThreeWayDialog_73.text: I have another matter to take care of first.

ThreeWayDialog_26.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
ThreeWayDialog_26.text: Take care of it quickly. You are needed here, and my patience wears thin.

ThreeWayDialog_29.speaker: Player
ThreeWayDialog_29.text: And I'm happy to do it - for a price.

ThreeWayDialog_28.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
ThreeWayDialog_28.text: You are honoured to serve a cause - a god. What greater reward could there be?

ThreeWayDialog_52.speaker: Player
ThreeWayDialog_52.text: I won't be much use to the cause if I'm destitute.

ThreeWayDialog_18.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
ThreeWayDialog_18.text: I will gather my warband, and reach the grove by next light.

ThreeWayDialog_45.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
ThreeWayDialog_45.text: You must make your way inside. Once I am in position, on your signal, we break them.

ThreeWayDialog_55.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
ThreeWayDialog_55.text: Kill our enemies, and take what you need.

ThreeWayDialog_31.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
ThreeWayDialog_31.text: We are servants of the one true god, not mercenaries.

ThreeWayDialog_37.speaker: Player
ThreeWayDialog_37.text: You're right. Serving the Absolute is its own reward.

ThreeWayDialog_2.speaker: Player
ThreeWayDialog_2.text: The Absolute has nothing to do with it. I'm here to kill you.

ThreeWayDialog_47.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
ThreeWayDialog_47.text: You would dare...? Guards - to me!

ThreeWayDialog_27.speaker: Player
ThreeWayDialog_27.text: You misunderstand. I'm here to slaughter you.

ThreeWayDialog_71.speaker: Player
ThreeWayDialog_71.text: I explained everything to her. She's just too stupid to understand.

ThreeWayDialog_36.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
ThreeWayDialog_36.text: A liar as well as a fool? I hope you're at least digestible.

ThreeWayDialog_67.speaker: Sazza
ThreeWayDialog_67.text: It ain't true! Them's the bloody liars!

ThreeWayDialog_59.speaker: Sazza
ThreeWayDialog_59.text: I got myself nabbed though; ended up all snug in a cage instead of smashed. I'm wily like that.

ThreeWayDialog_39.speaker: Sazza
ThreeWayDialog_39.text: And then the Absolute answered my prayers - sent a True Soul to save me!

ThreeWayDialog_4.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
ThreeWayDialog_4.text: A drow? Tell me, Sazza, did your misadventures take you to the Underdark?

ThreeWayDialog_61.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
ThreeWayDialog_61.text: How thoughtful. And where did you find this friend?
